# linkedEmulation

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of linkedEmulation is to compute predictive mean and variance of linked emulator with squared exponential kernel under independent and dependent cases.

## Installation

You can install the development version of linkedEmulation from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vicvolodina93/linkedEmulation")
```

## Example

In that case, don't forget to commit and push the resulting figure files, so they display on GitHub and CRAN.
